# Invitation to Qualify: Security Gate Control Upgrades – CSC Springhill, Nova Scotia
### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4160672431
* **Publication Date**: September 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 5, 2023, 2:00 PM (ET)
* **Contracting Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Project Overview

This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) is the first phase of a two-phase process to upgrade the security gate control systems at the Correctional Services Canada (CSC) facility in Springhill, Nova Scotia. The project involves replacing gate controls and ancillary equipment at buildings 1 and 20.

### Scope of Work

* Replace gate controls and ancillary equipment at buildings 1 and 20
* Replace existing exterior gates and doors control management systems
* The contract includes 78 weeks of performance time, with an estimated cost range of $500,001 to $1,000,000 (including HST)

### Qualification Criteria

* Suppliers must meet the qualification criteria set forth in the attached documents
* Suppliers may submit their qualifications in either official language of Canada

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:
Chantal Blanchard
SPAC/PSPC
chantal.blanchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

The ITQ can be accessed at: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17450901?extsite=MTc0NTA5MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17450901?extsite=MTc0NTA5MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Notes

* The prequalification list will expire within 60 days or upon award of a contract in Phase Two, whichever is earlier
* The qualification list will not be used in any other solicitation
* This is a Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) compliant contracting opportunity
